Name: San Diego State University Traveling Subjects Diffusion MRI (SDSU-TS) Dataset
Acknowledgements: We thank Ralph-Axel Müller, Ruth Carper, Annika Linke, and Inna Fishman from the Brain Development Imaging Lab at San Diego State University for sharing their scan protocols used in this dataset as well as the participants for their time and commitment to the study. Thanks also to the SDSU Imaging Center and Center for Functional MRI, UC San Diego for their technical support.
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite the dataset accession number or doi.
EthicsApprovals: San Diego State University Institutional Review Board (HS-2024-0194)
ReferencesAndLinks: Hau, J., Scarlett, S., & Arantes de Oliveira Campos, G. (2025). A traveling subjects dataset for diffusion MRI harmonization benchmarking [Poster presentation]. International Society for Magnetic Resonance in Medicine Workshop on 40 Years of Diffusion: Past, Present & Future Perspectives, Kyoto, Japan.

GeneratedBy.Name: ezBIDS
GeneratedBy.Description: ezBIDS is a web-based tool for converting neuroimaging datasets to BIDS

GeneratedBy.Name: Custom BIDS conversion scripts for GE research sequences
GeneratedBy.Description: In-house scripts were developed to convert the GE research diffusion sequences (i.e., 4shell96dir, 2shell93dir, and 3shell45dir) to BIDS.
